1423410.name: Zone of Death
1423410.description:
Zone of Death is a game with different modes and character classes, for single player and online gaming.

Zombie Mode:
Basic mechanics:
- Infinite number of waves. With each wave the zombies get bigger and stronger.
- Variety of weapons
- For every zombie you kill, you receive points, as well as points for hitting the body, which you can spend on buying new weapons and ammo.
- Cooperative multiplayer for up to 4 people (the more people, the more difficulty increases)

Shooter Mode:
At the moment, the game has 4 modes:
- Conquering the point
- Capture the flag
- Team deathmatch
- Solo deathmatch.

So there are 4 unique classes:
- Assault: using the ability increases movement speed
- Assistant: when using an ability, puts a mine before itself
- Medic: when using the ability, causes a drone that treats all allies around it.
- Sniper: when using the ability Can take off for a short distance from the ground and climb on buildings

In the near future will be added several maps and new game modes such as repel the wave of zombies in both solo and cooperative, survival in the open world. This is not all that will be added, but about this later.
1423410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
